content.raw:
For more detail, this branch ran for [9 hours last night on the windows machine](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-windows7-amd64/62/), and it was hanging at the following place:
~~~
[ 71%] Running xml schema compiler on actor.sdf
~~~

I checked the [current build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-windows7-amd64/63/) when it had been running for 52 minutes, and it was also stuck at the same place.

This could be a jenkins problem, but given that this PR is related to Windows support, I think we should fix that job before merging this.
content.html:
For more detail, this branch ran for 9 hours last night on the windows machine, and it was hanging at the following place:

[ 71%] Running xml schema compiler on actor.sdf

I checked the current build when it had been running for 52 minutes, and it was also stuck at the same place.

This could be a jenkins problem, but given that this PR is related to Windows support, I think we should fix that job before merging this.
